body_html:
I have that issue even after setting num_workers=0 or cv2.setNumThreads(0).

It fails with either of these two issues. Any one else facing the same thing?

body:
I have that issue even after setting num_workers=0 or cv2.setNumThreads(0). 

It fails with either of these two issues. Any one else facing the same thing?

Traceback (most recent call last):
 File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py3.6/lib/python3.6/runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
